# üå¶Ô∏è Reservamos Weather App 
A cross-platform mobile application for checking the weather forecast for the destinations available in Reservamos.

# üì≤ Installation

This app was built using the Expo development environment. In order to run the app you will only need a recent version of Node.js and a phone or emulator. 

First install the dependencies with:

```bash
npm i 
```

Then start the development server with:

```bash
npm start
```

‚ö†Ô∏è Install the Expo Go app on your iOS or Android phone and connect to the same wireless network as your computer. On Android, use the Expo Go app to scan the QR code from your terminal to open your project. On iOS, use the built-in QR code scanner of the default iOS Camera app.
